description: The 86Box software allows a user to install and run a variety of operating systems, such as DOS, Windows 1, Windows 95, and Windows XP. The 86F format was developed specifically for 86Box as an alternative to the .IMG format in order to better handle the various disk image formats associated with different operating systems.
NOTE: 86Box and the 86F format are developed by Miran Grca (Battler).
